description:
Perfect paddling pants for warmer weather/water conditions. We’ve designed them to be teamed up with the Fusion Vest for full core-plus-more insulation that's a convenient alternative to a Farmer John.

The Fusion series combines years of material development with exceptionally sophisticated patterning to produce neoprene that’s more comfortable to wear while you're active, and warmer in the water if you swim.

  • 3mm four-way super-stretch neoprene provides maximum comfort, fit, and mobility
  • High-cut back for coverage when seated
  • Drawstring on waist
name: MEC Fusion Neoprene Pants - Men's
